title: Borian Haldorak
text:
Borian Haldorak ([[dwarf]] councilor for [[Upper Dura]]) owes his position to the powerful bankers and merchants of [[Highhold]]. He is also a member
of the Gold Concord of the [[Aurum]], and serves the interests of this conspiracy. He is disarmingly cheerful and often plays up his age, telling elaborate stories about the great deeds of his youth. But beneath this fa√ßade, he is a sharp and ruthless negotiator. Most
interactions between the [[Aurum]] and the [[Boromar Clan]] are resolved by Borian and [[Ilyra|Ilyra Boromar]].
